dmca.title: Google Group DMCA complaint - CRSQA
dmca.body:
Council For Refractive Surgery Quality Assurance

www.USAEyes.org
www.ComplicatedEyes.org


8543 Everglade Drive
Sacramento, CA
95826-3616

voice 916/381-0796
fax 206/237-6545


Monday, October 09, 2006

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

via telefax (650) 963-3255

re: Copyright Violation
Groups.Google.com


Sir or Madam,

This letter is to notify you of a violation of the United States Digital Millennium Copyright 

Act that appears in Google searches, is on Google's newsgroup servers, and is cached on 

Google's servers.

A search query on the term "50 Tough Questions" at Google Groups 

(http://groups.google.com/) provides 

http://groups.google.com/group/alt.lasik-eyes/msg/61907957a49d3bc9 and 

http://groups.google.com/group/alt.lasik-eyes/msg/390fd99513b611ff

These postings are unauthorized republications of protected works originally and currently 

published at http://www.usaeyes.org/lasik/faq/lasik-tough-questions.htm

This is a unique situation in that Google not only publishes the item in violation of copyright, 

but also provides search engine result pages of that violation and has the violation cached 

on its servers.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly 

infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

The Council for Refractive Surgery Quality Assurance is a nonprofit nongovernmental 

national patient advocacy organization that evaluates and certifies surgeons who perform 

Lasik and similar laser eye surgery. Through our website at http://www.USAEyes.org we 

provide extensive, detailed, and objective information for patients considering Lasik and 

similar laser eye surgery.

The website in violation of DMCA is reportedly owned and operated by:

Google, Inc.
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
 
I request that the page(s) in violation, or as an alternative the entire website, be removed 

from your servers and/or public access. I also request that all cache, conversion, or 

replication of the page(s) in violation, or as an alternative the entire website, be removed 

from your servers and/or public access.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that 

I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive 

right that is allegedly infringed.
 
Glenn Hagele
Executive Director
glenn.hagele@usaeyes.org


:GH
dmca.principal_name: Council for Refractive Surgery Quality Assurance
